column4: I lost my downloads in firefox.  They always came to the desktop now the download window doesn't come up and I can't find the file
I lost my downloads in firefox.  They always came to the desktop.  Now, the download window doesn't come up and I can't find the file.
Edit -> Preferences -> Main tab.... change as needed...
supposedly going to ~/Desktop and show downloads
To the Desktop is the default setting, but change it to how-ever you want.
Did you understand the instructions I gave you?
Did you check the option:  "Show the Downloads window when downloading file" ?
yes, and that works if i choose to open the file
If you right-click on a link, you will get context menu with several options
Ok, that should do it, right?
